name: Starlight (itch)
description:
You are a wanderer with no name, descending onto the world when the skies darken and the stars grow dim.

Your job? To travel from star to star to light them like candles.

An altgame made for LowRezJam 2016.

May 17, 2016: An updated version has been released, which allows you to reach the ending without lighting every star. It also features (slightly) more text, and a little secret.

The original jam version is available for download.
